title: Toy Story
synopsis: Woody, a good-hearted cowboy doll who belongs to a young boy named Andy, sees his position as Andy's favorite toy jeopardized when his parents buy him a Buzz Lightyear action figure. Even worse, the arrogant Buzz thinks he's a real spaceman on a mission to return to his home planet.

title: Terminator
synopsis: A cyborg assassin called The Terminator is sent back through time to 1984 to kill the seemingly innocent Sarah Connor-a woman whose unborn son will lead the human race to victory in a bitter future war with a race of machines

title: Gladiator
synopsis: Taken into slavery and trained as a gladiator by Proximo, Maximus lives only that he might someday take his revenge and fulfill the dying wish of his emperor. The time soon comes when Proximo's troupe is called to Rome to participate in a marathon of gladiator games held at the behest of the new emperor, Commodus.

title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
synopsis: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II
